sql-select.name: total.qty
sql-select.query: select order_id, count(*) as total_items, sum(order_qty*unit_price) as total_amount from o_order_detail group by order_id

sql-select.name: total

named-query.name: top.open
named-query.query: find order join customer (name) join customer.billingAddress (*) join details join details.product (sku, name) order by customer.name asc limit 10
